positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description_html:
- Developed and implemented a fully automated CI/CD pipeline for a complex
microservices application deployed on AWS.
- Reduced deployment time by 50% by automating the CI/CD pipeline using AWS
CodePipeline, CodeBuild, CodeDeploy, and ECS.
- Leveraged Docker and Kubernetes to containerize and orchestrate microservices,
improving scalability and reliability.
- Implemented a blue-green deployment strategy to minimize downtime during
deployments, ensuring seamless user experience.
- Automated infrastructure provisioning and configuration management with
Terraform and Ansible, reducing manual effort and human error.
- Implemented automatic testing using tools like JUnit and Selenium to ensure
code quality and prevent regressions.
- Created custom Jenkins pipelines to orchestrate complex build, test, and
deployment processes.
- Implemented CI/CD pipeline monitoring using AWS CloudWatch to proactively
identify and resolve issues.
